name: Conditional order refused (joint and sole) SOLICITOR
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
((applicant1Label)): ((applicant1FullName))
((applicant2Label)): ((applicant2FullName))
Issue date: ((issueDate))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

The application for a conditional order has been refused. 

The court needs ((moreInfo??some additional information))((amendApplication??the application to be amended)). 

((isJoint??You need to agree the information with the other party before submitting it, because this is a joint application.))

View the refusal order in the documents tab: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Conditional order refused: ((reference number))
